Description.Text: Millennium Hotel at Chelsea Football Club is a luxury 4-star property offering stylish accommodation near the heart of London. It boasts a Marco Pierre White restaurant and a good location next to Stamford Bridge, close to the Chelsea Football Club museum and megastore. Chelsea is an affluent and predominantly residential area home to a wealth of high-end fashion outlets and trendy bars. Nearby places of interest include Stamford Bridge, Earls Court Exhibition Centre and the famous boutiques of King's Road. Fulham Broadway tube station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular London destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise complex with a light coloured brick facade and a glass entrance. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Guests can pay to use the nearby Chelsea Club, featuring an indoor swimming pool, Jacuzzi, saunas, steam rooms, plunge pools, three fitness rooms and four spa treatment rooms. Superior rooms are 23sqm and stylishly decorated in a contemporary style. Amenities include air-conditioning, tea and coffee equipment, free wired internet and Wi-Fi, a small sitting area, work desk, safe, complimentary mini-bar and flat-screen satellite TV with on-demand content. The marble en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. Marco is a stylish and elegant restaurant by Marco Pierre White, fusing culinary delights from the UK and Europe. Frankie's is a dynamic venue offering a tempting array of Italian dishes within a family-friendly environment. Guests can also enjoy a relaxing drink in the chic 55 Bar & Lounge. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service. Chargeable underground parking is possible onsite.
